about_the_game:
This Pack includes:

  • B1 ter tank (Rank 2 France);

  • P-40F-5 Lafayette fighter (Rank 2 France);

  • 120000 Silver Lions;

  • Premium Account for 7 days.

B1 ter

The B1 is one of France’s most iconic WWII tanks, thanks to its instantly recognizable appearance and widespread usage during the invasion of France in 1940.

This modification is a robust upgrade of the standard B1 bis. Firepower remains the same, but mobility and especially armor have been significantly improved. The sides and front have been upgraded to 70 mm, and considering the angling of the plates, these sections of armor are almost immune to many common cannons at this rank. Space has been made internally for an extra crew member to improve survivability. To compensate for the additional armor, the engine power has been increased to 350 hp, so you can still push through the map effectively and break through enemy lines with the help of the reinforced armor.

P-40F-5 Lafayette

A modification of the early P-40 models, the P-40F-5 features a Packard V-1650-1 Merlin engine and sports the livery of the famous Lafayette squadron, flown by pilot Constantin Rozanoff, commander of GC II/5.

The P-40F model is a highly versatile fighter with strong attributes across the board. It’s equipped with six 12.7 mm machine guns in the wings with a high ammo count — enough to take any aircraft out of the sky and strafe ground targets effectively. It can also carry a pair of 100 lb bombs along with a 500 lb bomb for close air support duties. The F model has a high top speed, strong climb rate, and good turn, giving you everything you need to be a highly effective fighter.

All premium vehicles allow you to earn increased Research Points and Silver Lions for each battle and comes furnished with all available modifications.

With a Premium account (also purchasable in the game for Golden Eagles) you will earn more Research Points and Silver Lions during each battle for a set amount of days. This is cumulative with bonuses from premium vehicles!

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.
detailed_description:
Note!

This product cannot be purchased for PlayStation® or Xbox accounts!

This DLC will only be granted to the Steam account that was used to make the purchase. If you have some issues, please contact our support (login on the website and use the "Submit a request" button at the top).


About the Game

This Pack includes:

  • B1 ter tank (Rank 2 France);

  • P-40F-5 Lafayette fighter (Rank 2 France);

  • 120000 Silver Lions;

  • Premium Account for 7 days.

B1 ter

The B1 is one of France’s most iconic WWII tanks, thanks to its instantly recognizable appearance and widespread usage during the invasion of France in 1940.

The sides and front have been upgraded to 70 mm, and considering the angling of the plates, these sections of armor are almost immune to many common cannons at this rank. linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most modern 64bit Linux distributions
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 660 with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) / similar AMD with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months; the minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p) with Vulkan support.
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1060 with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) / similar AMD (Radeon RX 560) with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) with Vulkan support.
  • Hard Drive: 95 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina v.10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (Xeon processors not supported)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro 5200 (Mac), or analog from AMD/Nvidia for Mac. Minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p with Metal support
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Big Sur v. 10.16 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 (Xeon processors not supported)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Vega II or higher with Metal support.
  • Hard Drive: 95 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

name: War Thunder - French Starter Pack

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy War Thunder - French Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1/8/10
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4GB (Windows Vista/7/8/10)
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.1 level video card: AMD Radeon 77XX / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660. The minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p.
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Ryzen 5 3600 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 level video card or higher and drivers: Nvidia GeForce 1060 and higher, Radeon RX 570 and higher
  • Hard Drive: 95 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: The iconic B1 ter tank and a P-40F-5 Lafayette fighter with premium bonuses, 7 days of Premium account and Silver Lions - a pack for the musketeers of War Thunder!
supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese, Russian*, Japanese*, Polish*, Czech*, Turkish*, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
